% Appendix B: Detailed Results Tables

\chapter{Detailed Results Tables}
\label{app:detailed-results}

\section{Overview}

This appendix provides complete numerical results for all experimental conditions, including summary statistics and cross-condition comparisons.

\section{Condition 1: Baseline Features (47) + Unweighted}
% Results generated by experimental pipeline (see Chapter~\ref{ch:experimental-design})

\subsection{Summary Statistics}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\small
\begin{tabular}{@{}lccccc@{}}
\toprule
\textbf{Model} & \textbf{Accuracy} & \textbf{Precision} & \textbf{Recall} & \textbf{F1} & \textbf{ROC-AUC} \\
\midrule
LogisticRegression & $0.696 \pm 0.133$ & $0.657 \pm 0.262$ & $0.702 \pm 0.284$ & $0.655 \pm 0.246$ & $0.781 \pm 0.152$ \\
SVM\_RBF & $0.703 \pm 0.143$ & $0.603 \pm 0.357$ & $0.545 \pm 0.390$ & $0.547 \pm 0.347$ & $0.635 \pm 0.311$ \\
RandomForest & $0.744 \pm 0.173$ & $0.653 \pm 0.373$ & $0.638 \pm 0.421$ & $0.615 \pm 0.369$ & $0.786 \pm 0.235$ \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Condition 1 summary statistics}
\label{tab:c1-summary}
\end{table}

\section{Condition 2: Extended Features (78) + Unweighted}
% Results generated by experimental pipeline (see Chapter~\ref{ch:experimental-design})

\subsection{Summary Statistics}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\small
\begin{tabular}{@{}lccccc@{}}
\toprule
\textbf{Model} & \textbf{Accuracy} & \textbf{Precision} & \textbf{Recall} & \textbf{F1} & \textbf{ROC-AUC} \\
\midrule
LogisticRegression & $0.699 \pm 0.152$ & $0.660 \pm 0.289$ & $0.641 \pm 0.314$ & $0.630 \pm 0.281$ & $0.783 \pm 0.126$ \\
SVM\_RBF & $0.757 \pm 0.143$ & $0.703 \pm 0.330$ & $0.651 \pm 0.354$ & $0.657 \pm 0.321$ & $0.726 \pm 0.265$ \\
RandomForest & $0.826 \pm 0.122$ & $0.814 \pm 0.255$ & $0.760 \pm 0.327$ & $0.759 \pm 0.271$ & $\mathbf{0.873 \pm 0.137}$ \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Condition 2 summary statistics}
\label{tab:c2-summary}
\end{table}

\subsection{Improvement over Baseline}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\begin{tabular}{@{}lcc@{}}
\toprule
\textbf{Model} & \textbf{$\Delta$ Accuracy} & \textbf{$\Delta$ ROC-AUC} \\
\midrule
LogisticRegression & +0.3pp & +0.2pp \\
SVM\_RBF & +5.4pp & \textbf{+9.1pp} \\
RandomForest & +8.2pp & \textbf{+8.7pp} \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Condition 2 improvement over Condition 1}
\label{tab:c2-improvement}
\end{table}

\section{Condition 3: Baseline Features (47) + Weighted}
% Results generated by experimental pipeline (see Chapter~\ref{ch:experimental-design})

\subsection{Summary Statistics}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\small
\begin{tabular}{@{}lccccc@{}}
\toprule
\textbf{Model} & \textbf{Accuracy} & \textbf{Precision} & \textbf{Recall} & \textbf{F1} & \textbf{ROC-AUC} \\
\midrule
LogisticRegression & $0.687 \pm 0.141$ & $0.654 \pm 0.271$ & $0.696 \pm 0.280$ & $0.649 \pm 0.247$ & $0.781 \pm 0.152$ \\
SVM\_RBF & $0.748 \pm 0.115$ & $0.690 \pm 0.314$ & $0.670 \pm 0.333$ & $0.659 \pm 0.299$ & $0.622 \pm 0.316$ \\
RandomForest & $0.736 \pm 0.141$ & $0.664 \pm 0.315$ & $0.660 \pm 0.393$ & $0.628 \pm 0.322$ & $0.821 \pm 0.191$ \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Condition 3 summary statistics}
\label{tab:c3-summary}
\end{table}

\subsection{Effect of Weighting (vs Condition 1)}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\begin{tabular}{@{}lcc@{}}
\toprule
\textbf{Model} & \textbf{$\Delta$ Accuracy} & \textbf{$\Delta$ ROC-AUC} \\
\midrule
LogisticRegression & $-0.9$pp & 0.0pp \\
SVM\_RBF & +4.5pp & $-1.3$pp \\
RandomForest & $-0.8$pp & \textbf{+3.5pp} \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Condition 3 effect of weighting}
\label{tab:c3-weighting}
\end{table}

\section{Condition 4: Extended Features (78) + Weighted}
% Results generated by experimental pipeline (see Chapter~\ref{ch:experimental-design})

\subsection{Summary Statistics}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\small
\begin{tabular}{@{}lccccc@{}}
\toprule
\textbf{Model} & \textbf{Accuracy} & \textbf{Precision} & \textbf{Recall} & \textbf{F1} & \textbf{ROC-AUC} \\
\midrule
LogisticRegression & $0.724 \pm 0.136$ & $0.687 \pm 0.283$ & $0.696 \pm 0.307$ & $0.670 \pm 0.270$ & $0.783 \pm 0.126$ \\
SVM\_RBF & $0.757 \pm 0.165$ & $0.718 \pm 0.338$ & $0.693 \pm 0.319$ & $0.693 \pm 0.309$ & $0.712 \pm 0.305$ \\
RandomForest & $0.801 \pm 0.146$ & $0.798 \pm 0.259$ & $0.760 \pm 0.327$ & $0.748 \pm 0.268$ & $0.859 \pm 0.162$ \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Condition 4 summary statistics}
\label{tab:c4-summary}
\end{table}

\subsection{Effect of Weighting (vs Condition 2)}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\begin{tabular}{@{}lcc@{}}
\toprule
\textbf{Model} & \textbf{$\Delta$ Accuracy} & \textbf{$\Delta$ ROC-AUC} \\
\midrule
LogisticRegression & +2.5pp & 0.0pp \\
SVM\_RBF & 0.0pp & $-1.4$pp \\
RandomForest & $-2.5$pp & $-1.4$pp \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Condition 4 effect of weighting}
\label{tab:c4-weighting}
\end{table}

\section{Cross-Condition Comparison Matrix}

\subsection{Random Forest ROC-AUC}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\begin{tabular}{@{}lcc@{}}
\toprule
 & \textbf{Baseline Features} & \textbf{Extended Features} \\
\midrule
\textbf{Unweighted} & $0.786 \pm 0.235$ & $\mathbf{0.873 \pm 0.137}$ \\
\textbf{Weighted} & $0.821 \pm 0.191$ & $0.859 \pm 0.162$ \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Random Forest ROC-AUC comparison matrix}
\label{tab:rf-rocauc-matrix}
\end{table}

\subsection{Random Forest Accuracy}

\begin{table}[H]
\centering
\begin{tabular}{@{}lcc@{}}
\toprule
 & \textbf{Baseline Features} & \textbf{Extended Features} \\
\midrule
\textbf{Unweighted} & $74.4\% \pm 17.3\%$ & $\mathbf{82.6\% \pm 12.2\%}$ \\
\textbf{Weighted} & $73.6\% \pm 14.1\%$ & $80.1\% \pm 14.6\%$ \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\caption{Random Forest Accuracy comparison matrix}
\label{tab:rf-accuracy-matrix}
\end{table}
